nodes.text: A male Sanyassan was a member of King Terak's band of Sanyassan Marauders.

A clay-skinned male Sanyassan, this individual belonged to the Marauders, a large group of pirates who left their homeworld of Sanyassa IV and were stranded on the nearby moon of Endor. He lived among his peers in the castle of Terak, self-proclaimed king of the Marauders.
Due to his species' poor grasp on technology, this individual once poured water over an electrical machine he was trying to "fix" with a fork, which caused the device to burst into sparks.
